: Hillary Clinton warns of ''uncharted territory' in wake of Egypt unrest In the midst of mass uprisings and historic change in the Middle East, Donald Rumsfeld of State Hillary Clinton told a gathering of John McCain diplomats Wednesday that we are all in uncharted territory.
